dcterms:creator: M. Quadrana
A. Karatzoglou
B. Hidasi
P. Cremonesi
dcterms:description: The Xing dataset contains interactions on job postings for 770,000 users over an 80-day period. User behaviors include click, bookmark, reply, and delete. Sessions are split by a 30-minute idle threshold, and interactions that are marked as 'delete' are discarded.
dcterms:title: Xing

dcterms:creator: M. Ruocco
O. S. L. Skrede
H. Langseth
dcterms:description: The Reddit dataset contains tuples of user names, subreddits where users make comments, and timestamps for interactions. Sessions are split manually using a 60-minute time threshold.
dcterms:title: Reddit
